content.text: Java How To Get the Area of a Rectangle
The area of a rectangle can be found by multiplying the length of the rectangle by the width:
content.html: The area of a rectangle can be found by multiplying the length of the rectangle by the width:

content.code:
int
length
=

5
;


int
width
=

2
;


int
area
=
length
*
width
;


System
.
out
.
println
(
"Area of rectangle: "

+
area
)
;
content.code_html:
int length = 5; 
int width = 2; 
int area = length * width; 
System.out.println("Area of rectangle: " + area);
